com.marklogic.hub

Interface MappingManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MappingManagerImpl

    public interface MappingManager
    Handles the artifacts associated with mapping of source documents into entity services models.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String MAPPING_FILE_EXTENSION
      String value for the mapping file extension

      • saveMapping

        void saveMapping(Mapping mapping,
                 boolean incrementVersion)
        Saves a map to disk, incrementing its version by 1
        Parameters:
        mapping - the mapping object to be saved
        incrementVersion - - true to increment version, false if not to
